\"Efficient company \"
\" The most prestigious and progressive vendor and a leader in the backup power provisioning industry focus on doing business of reliable and the “best in class” UPS, Inverter, Solar Products, Batteries, Computers and related accessories, Networking to all power needs and provides end-to-end solutions.\"
\n \n o We are authorized distributors & dealers of UPS, Inverters, Solar Systems, Servo Stabilizers, Batteries and IT equipments. We Offer a wide range of power electronics products for all commercial and residential needs of users. We are mainly doing the business from NUMERIC, IGA-TECH, HYKON, APC etc and HP, ACER, DELL, LENOVO etc; – well known branded products in this industry. We also focus on selling enhanced quality, reliable and performance based products having quality certificates like ISO. \n \n \no We take up the responsibility of providing after SALES & SERVICE for all kind of UPS, Inverters& Computers manufactured by others also. We are proud to announce our best service support that is well received and complemented by all of our customers. We have well-developed professional service setup with dedicated professionals for after sale service. We are focusing to delight customers by improving quality of life. \n \n \n o We have achieved a tremendous growth primarily by gaining 100% customer satisfaction and trading the best products in quality and cost effectiveness to our customers. Our products and services play a key role in successful operations of various Industries including but not limited to major Govt & Central Govt Departments, Banks, Hospitals, Engg. Colleges, Schools, Large and Small Scale businesses. Our Vision To be recognized as the leading power solutions provider.
\"To be recognized as the leading power solutions provider\"
\" We committed to providing the best quality products with competitive price and services exceeding our customers’ expectations in the most professional and ethical manner.\"
E3/33/6687, OPAL COMPLEX,Water Authority Road, Malapparamba, Kozhikode-673009 +91 9400623700, \n0495 2536304 bizarrepower@gmail.com https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Bizarre+Power+Solution/@11.2867352,75.8031745,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x46b44d1b2aa1c7b!8m2!3d11.2867352!4d75.8031745 https://www.facebook.com/bizarrepowersolutions/ Developed by:
